title: ACNN-TL: attention-based convolutional neural network coupling with transfer learning and contextualized word representation for enhancing the performance of sentiment classification

tldr.text: An Attention-Based Convolutional Neural Network with Transfer Learning (ACNN-TL) is proposed in this paper that not only tries to take advantage of both attention mechanism and transfer learning to boost the performance of sentiment classification but also language models are used as its the backbone to better express sentence semantics as word vector.
